db:info.db:title: KeyboardStyle QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Virtual Keyboard | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Provides a styling interface for the Virtual Keyboard.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The style type provides the style definitions that are used by the InputPanel to decorate the virtual keyboard.
The design size specifies the aspect ratio of the virtual keyboard. Styles are scalable according to scaleHint, which is calculated from the keyboard's actual height and design height.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the alternative keys list background.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListBottomMargin : real
db:section.db:para: Bottom margin for the alternate keys list panel.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the alternative keys list item.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used in a ListView.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListHighlight : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the alternative keys list highlight.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used as ListView.highlight.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListItemHeight : real
db:section.db:para: Height of the alternate keys list item.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListItemWidth : real
db:section.db:para: Width of the alternate keys list item.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListLeftMargin : real
db:section.db:para: Left margin for the alternate keys list panel.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListRightMargin : real
db:section.db:para: Right margin for the alternate keys list panel.

db:section.db:title: alternateKeysListTopMargin : real
db:section.db:para: Top margin for the alternate keys list panel.

db:section.db:title: backspaceKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the backspace key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: characterPreviewDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the character preview popup.
If the delegate contains the text property, the property is updated with the display text when the component becomes active.
Example:

db:section.db:title: characterPreviewMargin : real
db:section.db:para: Number of pixels between the top of each key and the bottom of the characterPreviewDelegate.

db:section.db:title: enterKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the enter key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: This property holds the delegate for the background of the full screen input.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputColor : color
db:section.db:para: This property holds the text color for the full screen input field.
The default color is black.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputContainerBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: This property holds the delegate for the background of the full screen input container.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputCursor : Component
db:section.db:para: This property holds the delegate for the cursor in the full screen input field.
The delegate should toggle the visibility of the cursor according to the parent.blinkStatus property defined for the full screen input field. For example:
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputFont : font
db:section.db:para: This property holds the font for the full screen input field.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputMargins : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the margins around the full screen input field.
The default value is 0.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputPadding : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the padding around the full screen input content.
The default value is 0.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputPasswordCharacter : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the password mask character for the full screen input field.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputSelectedTextColor : color
db:section.db:para: This property holds the selected text color for the full screen input field.
The default color is set to fullScreenInputColor.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2] fullScreenInputSelectionColor : color
db:section.db:para: This property holds the selection color for the full screen input field.
The default color is semi-transparent black.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 6.2] functionPopupListBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the function popup list background.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 6.2] functionPopupListDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the function list item.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used in a ListView.

db:section.db:para: The following properties are available to the item:

db:listitem.db:para: keyboardFunction - Keyboard function of the current item.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 6.2.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 6.2] functionPopupListHighlight : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the function popup list highlight.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used as ListView.highlight.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 6.2.

db:section.db:title: handwritingKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the handwriting mode key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: hideKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the hide key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: keyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the regular keys.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:para: Example:

db:section.db:title: keyboardBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the keyboard background.
Example:

db:section.db:title: keyboardDesignHeight : real
db:section.db:para: The design height of the keyboard.

db:section.db:title: keyboardDesignWidth : real
db:section.db:para: The design width of the keyboard.

db:section.db:title: keyboardHeight : real
db:section.db:para: The current height of the keyboard.

db:section.db:title: keyboardRelativeBottomMargin : real
db:section.db:para: The distance between the bottom-most keys and the bottom edge of the keyboard container, expressed as a percentage (0.0 - 1.0) of the keyboard's height.

db:section.db:title: keyboardRelativeLeftMargin : real
db:section.db:para: The distance between the left-most keys and the left edge of the keyboard, expressed as a percentage (0.0 - 1.0) of the keyboard's width.

db:section.db:title: keyboardRelativeRightMargin : real
db:section.db:para: The distance between the right-most keys and the right edge of the keyboard, expressed as a percentage (0.0 - 1.0) of the keyboard's width.
This value is proportional to the keyboard's width.

db:section.db:title: keyboardRelativeTopMargin : real
db:section.db:para: The distance between the top-most keys and the top edge of the keyboard, expressed as a percentage (0.0 - 1.0) of the keyboard's height.

db:section.db:title: languageKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the language key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] languageListAdd : Transition
db:section.db:para: This property holds the transition to apply to items that are added to the language list view.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] languageListBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the language list background.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] languageListDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the language list item.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used in a ListView.
The delegate must be based on the SelectionListItem type.

db:section.db:para: The following properties are available to the item:

db:listitem.db:para: displayName Display name of the language.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] languageListHighlight : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the language list highlight.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used as ListView.highlight.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] languageListRemove : Transition
db:section.db:para: This property holds the transition to apply to items that are removed from the language list view.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] languagePopupListEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines whether a popup list will be shown when the language key is clicked. If this property is false, clicking the language key cycles through the available languages one at a time.
The default value is false.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: modeKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the generic mode key.
This template provides a visualization of the key in which the state can be on or off. This template is used in situations where the key label will remain the same regardless of status.
The current state is available in the control.mode property.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 1.1] navigationHighlight : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the navigation highlight item.
This item is used in arrow-key-navigation mode to highlight the navigation focus on the keyboard.
The item is typically a transparent rectangle with a high contrast border.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 1.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] popupListAdd : Transition
db:section.db:para: This property holds the transition to apply to items that are added to the popup list view.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] popupListBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the popup list background.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] popupListDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the popup list item.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used in a ListView.
The delegate must be based on the SelectionListItem type.

db:section.db:para: The following properties are available to the item:

db:listitem.db:para: display Display text for the current item.
wordCompletionLength Word completion length measured from the end of the display text.
dictionary Dictionary type of the word, see QVirtualKeyboardSelectionListModel::DictionaryType.
canRemoveSuggestion A boolean indicating if the word can be removed from dictionary.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] popupListHighlight : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the popup list highlight.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used as ListView.highlight.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] popupListRemove : Transition
db:section.db:para: This property holds the transition to apply to items that are removed from the popup list view.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] scaleHint : real
db:section.db:para: The keyboard style scale hint. This value is determined by dividing keyboardHeight by keyboardDesignHeight. All pixel dimensions must be proportional to this value.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] selectionHandle : Component
db:section.db:para: This item is used to indicate where the bounds of the text selection is and to be able to interactively move the start or end of the selection. The same item is used for both start and end selection.
Selection handles are currently only supported for the application-based integration method.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 1.3] selectionListAdd : Transition
db:section.db:para: This property holds the transition to apply to items that are added to the selection list view.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 1.3.

db:section.db:title: selectionListBackground : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the selection list background.

db:section.db:title: selectionListDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the selection list item.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used in a ListView.
The delegate must be based on the SelectionListItem type.

db:section.db:para: The following properties are available to the item:

db:listitem.db:para: display Display text for the current item.
wordCompletionLength Word completion length measured from the end of the display text.
dictionary Dictionary type of the word, see QVirtualKeyboardSelectionListModel::DictionaryType.
canRemoveSuggestion A boolean indicating if the word can be removed from dictionary.

db:section.db:title: selectionListHeight : real
db:section.db:para: Selection list height.

db:section.db:title: selectionListHighlight : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the selection list highlight.

db:note.db:para: The delegate is used as ListView.highlight.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 1.3] selectionListRemove : Transition
db:section.db:para: This property holds the transition to apply to items that are removed from the selection list view.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 1.3.

db:section.db:title: shiftKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the shift key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: spaceKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the space key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: symbolKeyPanel : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the symbol mode key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the KeyPanel type.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] traceCanvasDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for rendering a Trace object.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the TraceCanvas type.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1] traceInputKeyPanelDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Template for the trace input key.

db:note.db:para: The delegate must be based on the TraceInputKeyPanel type.

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard.Styles 2.1.
